original_text: And the Lord appeared in the tabernacle in a pillar of a cloud: and the pillar of the cloud stood over the door of the tabernacle.
korean_text: 여호와께서 구름 기둥 가운데에서 장막에 나타나시고 구름 기둥은 장막 문 위에 머물러 있더라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord appeared in the tabernacle
in a pillar of a cloud
and the pillar of the cloud stood
over the door of the tabernacle
